idea: At OpenScale, we aim to build a platform that will scale the discovery and distribution of open source products by connecting them with businesses looking to leverage the power of the open-source. The platform will consist of a suite of products, which can be thought of as modules that can be built on a SaaS model - with different models based on whether you're a customer (business looking for open source tools), the seller (an open-source product company looking to get listed and discovered), or a developer looking to get paid gigs to solve various issues/feature requests/bugs, etc for the open-source products listed on the platform.
name: ADALIN LABS LLP

idea:
Tailorhome is a Fashion technology company that is in the planning stage.

Tailorhome  reverses the role of visiting Tailor to "Tailor visiting your doorstep". Tailorhome plans to integrate Tailors, fashion consultants, dry cleaners, alterations, rent, fabric sellers and every possible textile business related stakeholders in one platform by adding strong supply chain connecting to customers.


In simple terms, below are the features where MVP is also defined.

1.  Customer can Book "Tailors at doorstep"

2. Customer can Book "Fashion consultant at doorstep" or "online consultation"

3. Customers can add their one time used clothes on rent and earn from it.

4. Customers can get clothes on rent, connecting to tailors for alteration

4. Tailors can order fabrics online in bulk from garments wholesalers(B2B)

5.  Customer's can order Dry cleaners at doorstep to collect clothes.

6. Customer can choose different fabrics and get them at doorstep and choose one from it.
name: TailorHome

idea:
Mynd is a mental health service started in August 2020 amidst the pandemic. The aim is to provide accessible and pocket-friendly psychological services such as therapy, psychiatric consultations, assessments, and testing to the student community largely. Apart from that, we also aim to psycho educate the audience through our social media pages and by hosting several

workshops, listening circles, events, and collaborations with our companies. At present, Mynd has around 350 clients and a team of 30 professionals who offer their services at minimal rates.
name: Mynd

idea:
A Team of professionals with more than a decade have expertise in Decorative concrete and stamped Concrete. Over 500 prestigious projects have been carried out across PAN India.

We are one of the best quality raw material manufacturers and an application company. Our Professionals In-depth knowledge of Ready-mix concrete & site mix enables us to deliver the work in time without compromising on the quality. Whether it is Indoor or Outdoor, we are responsible to beautify your place, giving you the state-of-the-art design.

           Artcrete India Private Limited is a Private incorporated on 04 August 2021. It is        
           classified as non-govt company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Mumbai.    
           Its authorized share capital is Rs. 200,000 and its paid-up capital is Rs. 200,000 (in   
           last 3 months investment Rs. 10,00,000 by the shareholders). It is involved in   
           Manufacture of basic chemicals for constructions and in execution / contracting. 

Artcrete India Pvt. Ltd. is currently supplying material to various projects Pan India and received a prestigious Order (Deal slip) from Reliance Industries Ltd. worth of 50L+ and expecting few more orders which will reach up to 2-3 Cr. within 2-3 months.



Artcrete India Private Limited's Corporate Identification Number is (CIN) U24110MH2021PTC365255 and its registration number is 365255.Its Email address is acounts.artcreteindia@gmail.com and its registered address is H NO 483/A/5, GALA- 5,6, GR. FLR SHIV KRUPA BLDG, KALHER THANE  MH 421302 IN  ,

VISION
To raise the standard of artisan handcraft of various architectural products and supply of best quality raw material to raise the standard of the projects in India. Respect and value of the projects, customers, and the motherland 

MISSION

Turnover Rs. 5 Cr. in 2022-23 & 10 Cr. by 2024-25
name: ARTCRETE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Micro Elevators India Limited is dedicated in providing leading elevator experience to its clients with unique engineering capabilities since [year of inception]. The company expertise in multi-brand portfolio through its new and innovative elevator designs as well as its proficiency in modernizing the existing ones. We just not believe in connecting floors but also endure to create a fresh elevating experience for our clients. We stand by our four significant principles of - Usage of hi-tech innovative technology, experienced skilled troop delivering it, excellent quality and enhanced customer experience.

Micro Elevators India Limited have always got the right application for each client’s varying needs. As a leading company in this market, we have always looked forward to creating exceptional product values for our clients. Our products and services are tailored in such a way that it very well fits the elevator needs of any buildings and varying needs. From mass movement to the limited elevating needs, we’ve always got your back by providing the best and the safest products.
name: MICRO ELEVATORS INDIA LIMITED

idea:
We as Start-up Entrepreneurs have come up with platform which caters to the needs of fashion-loving customers globally. Our collections include tons of customisation styles in fashion such as custom suits, custom blazers, custom shirts, custom T shirts, custom pants, custom jeans/Chinos etc. In order to bring back the joy of custom clothing, we created “Tailorz”.
Vision is to make custom clothing affordable, accessible, convenient and easy. We aim to offer personalised service to our valuable customers.
name: BR3 CLOTHING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
As we have started, our mission has been to help investors and traders, we are here for peoples who wants to save their energy on finding answers to their queries about the share market.
We are trying to provide all the information about the share market with quality content. Our ultimate motive is to provide some assistance to investors and traders on their basic understanding of the share market
name: sikhosharebazaar.com

idea: We Started as small Career Guidance and college buddy Company, where we used to help our clients with their college admissions, form filling, What to do, and what not to do in the new phase of their respective lives  Mentorship, Now we are aiming to start a consultancy for teachers, and different educators to restart their career in the online world.
name: EDBEE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
HUM HAI RETAILERS KI APNI BRANDED DUKAAN


"We M/s. ZOYANI is clothing brand from Mumbai, Maharashtra, INDIA. 


We are the only wholesale clothing brand for retailers. We sell directly to retailers without any agent or distributor.


This benifits the retailer with high margin, good quality and better transperency.


we have few much better plans in pipeline for which we want to raise funds.


ZOYANI

is a Joint Collaboration between

Mr. Yash Salvi and Ms. Sheetal Chhari.

The Joint Venture has been set up to deliver the latest and best quality garments with best designs under the budget as per requirements of their clients and customers.

We work in association with best in industry to ensure that bad quality as an issue will never exist.

ZOYANI as a partnership firm was established on 1st day of September, 2020 with only mission that is to redefine elegance and ease of doing business for all.

Our unique business plans for 100% cotton formal shirts includes a proper streamlined channel for smooth business with our growth plans.
name: ZOYANI
